H0.text: On which river does Ipswich stand. Stour

H1.text: On which river does Ipswich stand. Thames

H2.text: On which river does Ipswich stand. Ouse

H3.text: On which river does Ipswich stand. Orwell

A4.text: The River Orwell flows through the county of Suffolk in England from Ipswich to Felixstowe.
